column2: u-blox 8 / u-blox M8 from protocol version 15 up to version 23.01

Message UBX-MGA-GPS-IONO: Comment This message allows the delivery of GPS ionospheric assistance to a receiver. See the
description of AssistNow Online for details.

column2: - type - Message type (0x06 for this type)
- version - Message version (0x00 for this version)
